titulo: Deliciosas Conversaciones [Delicious Conversations]: Easy Stories to Practice Your Spanish
descripcion:
Now you can greatly improve your Spanish listening skills with short stories specially designed to help you practice Spanish by listening using vocabulary that you can actually use every day, This short novel is narrated in easy Spanish because it is not as complex as some other stories written to win literature contests. 
This will make it easier to understand Spanish. 
Aimed at people who want to learn Spanish by repeated listening, this book will help you improve comprehension and familiarize yourself with unique expressions in Spanish.
